summary: An Enb wich aims to be immersive. You will see bright sunny days while having moody rainy days.
descriptionHtml:
New Release of new Enb: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54390/?] CrowEnb[/url]

THIS ENB DOESN'T GIVE A SHIT ABOUT PERFORMANCE OR OPTIMIZATION! I'M DOING THIS MOD FOR THE GREAT VISUALS!
I got a i5 4570 and a GTX 780 OC and I'm getting 35-90FPS, average is ~45-50.


Hi there!
This Enb preset aims to be immersive, while being bright and friendly at the same time.
It comes with a custom Bokeh high quality DoF, wich lets scenes seem very cinematic.
It is based on Asgaards111111s Decade Ov Skyrim Enb, but I worked over pretty much every important valuable. I agree to take this file back if he would not want it to be published! Keep in mind he deserves most of the credits!
It is inspired by Unreals Screenshots, but still different since I made it as I thought it was pretty!
It is NOT finished yet! I am still working on some Issues and ugly places.

Installation:
1. Download the Enb v252 from enbdev.com
2. Copy/Paste the d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe into your Skyrim main folder
3. Copy/Paste all of my files into your Skyrim main folder
4. Insert the correct memory variables into the enblocal.ini
5. Disable AA and AF COMPLETELY!
6. Insert the following lines into your SkyrimPrefs.ini:
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
7.(optional) Install the recommended mods:
7.1 Blackout - Simply darker Dungeons
7.2 Fixed Eye Adaption
7.3 Water mod: Realistic Water Two(I am using this with my newest version)/Pure Waters(Used for the screenshots of v0.1)
7.4 Dramatic Clouds Ultra
7.5 Skyrim Flora Overhaul
7.6 DatGrass (only for high-end-PCs)
7.7 Relighting Skyrim Series
7.8 Immersive HUD
7.9 Beautiful Skyrim Galaxy and Nebula Pack
7.10 Unique Grasses and Groundcovers
7.11 4k Quality Snow HD
7.12 aMidianBorn Book of Silence (awsome *-*)
7.13 Static Mesh Improvement Mod
7.10 Audio Overhaul for Skyrim (Nothing for Graphics but highly recommended for immersion!)

Known Issues:
1. Trees may look a bit purple, I am currently working on fixing that
2. Some Dungeons may seem to be a bit...too bright, also working on that

Changelog:
v0.2.1:
- This Version wants to be a more realistic rather than vibrant/cozy one.
- Edited Shaders to make it look more bleak and realistic
- Edited Water
- Activated Cloudshadows, prepare for awsomeness!
- Edited Ambient Occlusion
- Edited some minor stuff
v0.1:
- Adjusted indoor lighting, it should be more immersive and warm now
- Adjusted indoor specular light

Keep in mind that the current version is an alpha! If you got any questions, feedback or you found a problem, i would be pleased if you PM me with your concern!

I hope you enjoy using this Enb as much as I do, endorse this file and that you get the same sick graphics as i do! If you do so, please endorse this Enb!

Thanks to:
Asgaard111111, whos Enb i used as a base!
Unreal, whos work inspired me!
Dittosrage, who checked the screenshots and encouraged me to upload it!
Everyone who's giving me feedback!
author: NCISsuchti
